descriptionHtml:
[b]Description[/b]

It body replacer for Skyrim. Lowpoly game model is made with hipoly vocsel model. 
High-resolution textures are drawn from photo reference.
New Normal map textures.
Hairs on other mesh.
Textures is compatible with the vanilla model, but may be minor glitches...
The model replace the body and feets. Hands jast retextured. 

At work, I tried to do everything as realistic.

You can choose underwear or naked option with different types of public hair.

Enjoy.

[b]Installation.[/b]

Manually.

1. Look at the mod images to decide which version you prefer.
2. Download the file. 
3. Use 7zip to open the file. You will see three folders, and a text file. 
4. Select the base/data folder (ctrl+click) and then click on \'extract\'. A small window will popup, asking where you want the files extracted to. Assuming your Skyrim game hasn\'t been moved from your Steam folder, and you use Window 7/Vista, you will want to direct it to go to: C:/Program Files (x86)/Steam/SteamApps/common/Skyrim/
Click \'OK\' and the files will be installed. If you\'re on a Mac, or another version of Windows, or you\'ve moved your Skyrim files elsewhere, you\'ll need to locate your Steam folder/where Skyrim is and extract these two files to Skyrim/. 
5. (Optional) Select the 1 of (optional)/data folder and copy files to youre Skyrim/ folder.

[b]Uninstallation.[/b]

Delete all the files you installed.

[b]Known Issues or Bugs[/b]

Argonian and kajit have public hair. Will be fixed by addon when will be released CK.
(removed by Unique Bodies addon)

Wrong connection in Unique Bodies NPS heads and bodies. WIP 

[b]Versions[/b]
[b]0.1[/b]
Mesh 
 female (nude, unerwear) body and feet mesh.
Textures
 Argonian and kajit 2048
 Peoples 4096

[b]0.2[/b]
Male added

[b]0.22[/b]
small changes.

Unique Bodies added. based on Unique Bodies - WIP by Rain The Windflower
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5968

[b]0.23[/b] Bigger penis in nude version.

[b]Tools used:[/b]

3d max - modeling,
3dcoat - retopology from hipoly referens.
BodyPaint, CorelPhotopaint - texturing.

[b]Thanks[/b]
Thanks skyrimnexus forum where I found the answers to the questions.
Thanks to Bethesda Softworks for making The Elder Scrolls V.
Thanks to mitiok18 for good screens.

[b]2 all[/b]
Add more good screens pls.

- 4uDIK
author: 4uDIK
